channel.title: Coder for hire here! best coder, coded over 50 sources!
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Experienced coder here.[/size]
I have had my on server and coded about 50 sources this year. I have been coding for 2 years and i leared alot from codeusa (a company i used to work for) I code alot and know how to change client openings, edit text, add anything, and minigames!
Add me on msn IM: Planbskater1@hotmail.com
Have a nice day. :)
-Redbloodelf2

item.title: Coder for hire here! best coder, coded over 50 sources!
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

[quote=“anc13nts1, post:26, topic:231032”][quote author=redbloodelf2 link=topic=304251.msg2438988#msg2438988 date=1221360374]
[size=15pt]Experienced coder here.[/size]

  I have had my on server and coded about 50 sources this year.

I have been coding for 2 years and i leared alot from codeusa (a company i used to work for)
I code alot and know how to change client openings, edit text, add anything, and minigames!

   Add me on msn IM: Planbskater1@hotmail.com

Have a nice day. 

                                        -Redbloodelf2

[/quote]

No offense, I learned all of that crap from the first day I ever started coding. This is why moparscape fails really, noob coders think they are good enough to get payed to code when I’m pretty sure all they do is copy and paste and if they need another code they just download another server and take the code from that.
If you think that is coding and or\ just changing the text of a client, then you should go kill your self along with all the other “Moparscapers”

If you really think your a good coder…

Tell me what you can code and give me a example of what you code and tell me what it does.
I will know if your lying because I can code C++,Java, and Html, And I know I am a good coder
so bring it. I wanna see how a half retarded sped responds.

Also I bet you can’t even make a simple “Hello World” program in c++ because your so damn retarded, just view this guys profile and look at his recent post[/quote]

Whats even funnier, a quick search on google for “codeusa” turns up an ipbfree forum lmao

Brendan

Read full topic

i hate calling it coding…becase most of the time pepole really are not coding…
[/quote]
Yea most of the time ppl look in the files and ‘edit’ the codes…
I do that for simple little changes but I also actually do code.[/quote]
Agreed.
I really hate it when people know what they’re talking about when they clearly don’t. It’s not calling coding, it’s called Java programming me thinks.

item.title: Coder for hire here! best coder, coded over 50 sources!
item.dc:creator: @_Steven ©Steven©
item.description:
@_Steven wrote:

I’ll try 

                            connections.add(connectingHost);

adds the connectingHost String to an array.

                            playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);

adds a new playerclient by calling a method with paramenters s, connectingHost

} else {           
s.close();
}

If it cannot, close the socket (s)

} else {
misc.println(
    "ClientHandler: Rejected " + connectingHost + ":"
    + s.getPort());
    s.close();

Else, print out
“ClientHandler: Rejected HOSTNAME:PORT”

Then close the socket.

        } catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {

Catch IOException errors

if (!shutdownClientHandler) {

if shutdownClientHandler is false…

                misc.println(
                        "Error: Unable to startup listener on "
                                + serverlistenerPort + " - port already in use?");

print out

"Error: Unable to startup listener on PORT - port already in use?

            } else {
                misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down.");
            }
        }
    }

Else, just print out
“ClientHandler was shut down.”

Read full topic

item.title: Coder for hire here! best coder, coded over 50 sources!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

while your here can you explain thois to me…im confused

connections.add(connectingHost); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); } else { s.close(); } } } else { misc.println( "ClientHandler: Rejected " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort()); s.close(); } } } catch (java.io.IOException ioe) { if (!shutdownClientHandler) { misc.println( "Error: Unable to startup listener on " + serverlistenerPort + " - port already in use?"); } else { misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down."); } } }

item.title: Coder for hire here! best coder, coded over 50 sources!
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well, To be truthful moparscape isnt nearly as impressive as coding some kind of real java.
If you have been coding Java for 2 years, you should have ATLEAST one little code that you can create and post here.

You need proof for things like this
And to be clear im not flaming or being mean, I just am telling you what most people expect to see.

PS.
If you can code a source in 6 hours or less and like 2 a day like I coded mine, its not that hard to code about 50 in a year…
So any1 who flames this guy, dont. Its very much possible as well as easy if your determined.
